entrypoint_cell_wardenhall.name: Sturdy wooden door
entrypoint_cell_wardenhall.description: Seems like a good way to get out of here
entrypoint_cell_wardenhall.description2: This door will take me back to my cell.

entrypoint_wardenHall_storageroom.name: Old wooden door
entrypoint_wardenHall_storageroom.description: You hear something scratching on the other side of the door,probably rats.
entrypoint_wardenHall_storageroom.description2: Guess this is the only way out of this room.

entrypoint_wardenHall_secretpassage.name: Dusty bookcase
entrypoint_wardenHall_secretpassage.description: An old bookcase covered in dust, except for this one spot. Looks like something is missing from this bookcase
entrypoint_wardenHall_secretpassage.description2: I wonder if this will let me exit the secret passage.

entrypoint_secretpassage_staircasetower.name: Wooden bookcase
entrypoint_secretpassage_staircasetower.description: Another bookcase. This is probably the end of the passage,I need to be careful.
entrypoint_secretpassage_staircasetower.description2: I wonder how many people know about this secret passage.

entrypoint_wardenHall_courtyard.name: Oak door
entrypoint_wardenHall_courtyard.description: You look through the window in the door and see the courtyard.

entrypoint_courtyard_gardens.name: Vine covered gate
entrypoint_courtyard_gardens.description: You can see the gardens from here.
entrypoint_courtyard_gardens.description2: This will lead me back to the courtyard.

entrypoint_courtyard_entrancehall.name: Barred doors
entrypoint_courtyard_entrancehall.description: These big doors must be the entrance to the castle
entrypoint_courtyard_entrancehall.description2: If I remember correclty these will be bring me back to the courtyard.

entrypoint_entrancehall_greathall.name: Old oak door
entrypoint_entrancehall_greathall.description: You can tell this is the door to the great hall from the lingering smell of food
entrypoint_entrancehall_greathall.description2: This leads back to the entrance hall.

entrypoint_greathall_kitchens.name: Wooden door
entrypoint_greathall_kitchens.description: The smell of food coming from this door is even greater than before, these must be the kitchens
entrypoint_greathall_kitchens.description2: Only way out is back to the great hall.

entrypoint_entrancehall_staircasetower.name: Oak door
entrypoint_entrancehall_staircasetower.description: You peak through the little window in the door and see only stairs
entrypoint_entrancehall_staircasetower.description2: Looks like the entrance hall is still empty

entrypoint_staircasetower_westwing.name: Blue painted door
entrypoint_staircasetower_westwing.description: According to the rumors there is a wizard living on this side of the castle
entrypoint_staircasetower_westwing.description2: I can use this door to go to the other side of the castle.

entrypoint_westwing_wizardtower.name: Runed door
entrypoint_westwing_wizardtower.description: This is clearly the door to the wizard tower.
entrypoint_westwing_wizardtower.description2: This will lead me back to the west wing.

entrypoint_staircasetower_eastwing.name: Red painted door
entrypoint_staircasetower_eastwing.description: The royal signs on the door must mean I am on the right track.
entrypoint_staircasetower_eastwing.description2: These will take me back to the staircase tower.

entrypoint_eastwing_royalquaters.name: Barred wooden door
entrypoint_eastwing_royalquaters.description: A strong impenetrable door.I must be close to the royal quarters
entrypoint_eastwing_royalquaters.description2: Whenever I need to be in the east wing I need to go through this door.

entrypoint_royalquarters_kingsroom.name: Gilded oak door
entrypoint_royalquarters_kingsroom.description: Gold on the door? This will probably take me to the king
entrypoint_royalquarters_kingsroom.description2: I wonder what I'll find more in the royal quarters
